ruleTR_R0001.name: Invalid hold_date
ruleTR_R0001.message: DATE/hold_dateの日付が不正です。形式はYYYYMMDDで3年以内の日付を指定してください。

ruleTR_R0002.name: Missing hold_date
ruleTR_R0002.message: DATE/hold_dateの記載がなく、このSubmissionはAccession番号発行後に即日公開されますのでご注意ください。非公開期間を設けたい場合にはDate/hold_dateに公開日を記載してください。

ruleTR_R0003.name: Taxonomy error warning
ruleTR_R0003.message: If applicable, the taxonomy id will be automatically filled and the organism will be corrected to the scientific name. When the organism(s) is novel, please enter proposed name(s) in the organism, leave the taxonomy id empty and submit the BioSample.

ruleTR_R0004.name: Taxonomy at species or infraspecific rank
ruleTR_R0004.message: Taxonomy should be species or infraspecific level.

ruleTR_R0005.name: Unnecessary WGS keywords
ruleTR_R0005.message: Completeゲノムの場合にはKEYWORD"WGS"は不要ですので削除して下さい。Contigレベルの場合にはそのまま"WGS"を残してください。

ruleTR_R0006.name: Check by jParser
ruleTR_R0006.message: jParserの実行でエラーが発生しました

ruleTR_R0007.name: Check by Transchecker
ruleTR_R0007.message: transCheckerの実行でエラーが発生しました

ruleTR_R0008.name: Check by AGPParser
ruleTR_R0008.message: AGPParserの実行でエラーが発生しました

ruleTR_R0009.name: Missing DBLINK
ruleTR_R0009.message: 事前にBioProject/BioSample(or DRA)の登録が必要で、それらのAccession番号をDBLINKとして記載する必要があります。

ruleTR_R0010.name: Invalid BioProject accession
ruleTR_R0010.message: DBLINK/projectにはDDBJで登録したBioProjectのAccessionID PRJDxxxxを記入してください

ruleTR_R0011.name: Invalid BioSample accession
ruleTR_R0011.message: DBLINK/biosampleにはDDBJで登録したBioProjectのAccessionID SAMDxxxxを記入してください

ruleTR_R0012.name: Invalid DRR accession
ruleTR_R0012.message: DBLINK/sequence read archiveにはDDBJで登録したRUNのAccessionID DRRxxxxを記入してください

ruleTR_R0013.name: Invalid combination of accessions
ruleTR_R0013.message: DBLINK/project、DBLINK/biosampl、DBLINK/sequence read archiveのAccession番号が同一Projectのものでない可能性があります。IDをご確認ください。

ruleTR_R0014.name: Inconsistent submitter
ruleTR_R0014.message: BioProject/BioSample/DRA accession is not registered in your account. Please provide a valid BioProject accession.

ruleTR_R0015.name: Inconsistent organism with biosample
ruleTR_R0015.message: BioSampleに記載されたorganism/strainと一致しません

ruleTR_R0016.name: Inconsistent isolate with biosample
ruleTR_R0016.message: BioSampleに記載されたisolateと一致しません

ruleTR_R0017.name: Inconsistent isolation_source with biosample
ruleTR_R0017.message: BioSampleに記載されたisolation_sourceと一致しません

ruleTR_R0018.name: Inconsistent collection_date with biosample
ruleTR_R0018.message: BioSampleに記載されたcollection_dateと一致しません

ruleTR_R0019.name: Inconsistent country with biosample
ruleTR_R0019.message: BioSampleに記載されたcountryと一致しません

ruleTR_R0020.name: Inconsistent locus_tag_prefix with biosample
ruleTR_R0020.message: locus_tagがBioSampleのlocus_tag_prefix属性として記載されていないものです。(BSのlocus_tag_prefixを表示)

ruleTR_R0021.name: Invalid date format
ruleTR_R0021.message: Invalid /collection_date foramt. Follow ISO 8601 standard "YYYY-mm-dd", "YYYY-mm", "YYYY-mm-ddThh:mm:ss+hh:mm" or "YYYY-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ" (eg., 1990-10-30, 1990-10, 1990-10-30T14:41:36+09:00 or 1990-10-30T14:41:36Z).

ruleTR_R0022.name: Future collection date
ruleTR_R0022.message: /collection_date is a future date, please specify a date from the past.

ruleTR_R0023.name: Duplicate locus_tag
ruleTR_R0023.message: The following locus_tag were used in this file more than one time. Please provide unique locus_tag.

ruleTR_R0024.name: Missing locus_tag
ruleTR_R0024.message: locus_tagの記載が推奨されるfeatureにlocus_tag qualifierの記載がありません

ruleTR_R0025.name: More detailed organism
ruleTR_R0025.message: より詳細な生物種名の記載が必要です

ruleTR_R0026.name: Virus organism name
ruleTR_R0026.message: このウィルスではspecies名記載して下さい？

ruleTR_R0027.name: Oryza sativa organism name
ruleTR_R0027.message: Oryza sativaの場合はより詳細な生物種名の記載を推奨します

ruleTR_R0028.name: Brassica organism name
ruleTR_R0028.message: 記載されたBrassicaでは、より詳細な生物種名の記載を推奨します

ruleTR_R0029.name: Invalid taxonomy for genome sample
ruleTR_R0029.message: For a genome assembly derived from an unidentified/unpublished organism, a species-level informal name in form of "Genus sp. strain" should be used.

ruleTR_R0030.name: Inconsistent culture_collection with biosample
ruleTR_R0030.message: BioSampleに記載されたculture_collectionと一致しません

ruleTR_R0031.name: Inconsistent host with biosample
ruleTR_R0031.message: BioSampleに記載されたhostと一致しません

ruleTR_R0033.name: other INSDC partners accession
ruleTR_R0033.message: DBLINKに記載されているAccession IDはDDBJのものではありません

ruleTR_R0034.name: Invalid BioProject type
ruleTR_R0034.message: BioProject is an Umbrella project, not a primary data type of BioProject. Please provide the accession of the correct primary data BioProject or create a new BioProject, if necessary.
